description:
William has short, neatly combed hair and wears rectangle-shaped glasses that have decorative lines on the sides of the frames. He dresses in a nice black suit, tie and dress shoes, similar to Ronald Knox and wears black gloves. When he infiltrates the Noah`s Ark Circus as Suit, he wears a white suit and spotted tie.
He almost always displays a near-frown on his face.
Source: kuroshitsuji.wikia.com
name: William T. Spears
